title: Did we have the resources thousands of years ago to develop modern technology but just not the knowledge? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. The physical resources (to make the plastics and metal) were always here. We just never had the right questions to the answers given to us by nature. Even now we may have resources we can barely understand , let alone put to use. There is always something we can’t see until it smacks us in the face.
